Hindbrain of ABA 2009.ParcellationScheme: ABA 2009 adult mouse brain parcellation scheme
Hindbrain of ABA 2009.Is part of: Basic cell groups and regions of ABA 2009
Hindbrain of ABA 2009.Definition: Mouse brain region comprising the medulla and pons.  This parcellation scheme does not include the cerebellum in the hindbrain.
